compat-change.description: Adding an installer package name to a package that does not have one set requires the INSTALL_PACKAGES permission. If the caller targets R, this will throw a SecurityException. Otherwise the request will fail silently. In both cases, and regardless of whether this change is enabled, the installer package will remain unchanged.
compat-change.name: THROW_EXCEPTION_ON_REQUIRE_INSTALL_PACKAGES_TO_ADD_INSTALLER_PACKAGE
